bibl.title: Letter from Anne Pemberton to Philip Showalter Hench, [19--]

div1.p: Pemberton thanks Hench for giving a speech to her club.

div1.head: Letter from Anne Pemberton to Philip Showalter Hench, [19--]
div1.opener:
Ac
Ms
930 EIGHTH STREET, S. W.
ROCHESTER, MINNESOTA
Dear Phil,
div1.p:
I want to thank
you once more for giving your
wonderfully interesting talk
to our Study Club yesterday.
I don't think any of us realized
how much personal research
you have put into this
subject, or what a thrilling
story it is. You made our
meeting yesterday so enter-
taining that I've afraid the
programs for the rest of the
winter will seem very dull
by comparison!

We all appreciate so
very much your great kindness
in giving up your whole afternoon
I am only sorry that we didn't
plan to invite guests, so that
more people could have
enjoyed it with us.

I hope the trip to Washing-
ton is as interesting as you
anticipate, and that you're
successful in your sleuthing!
